reviewText: I bought this dvd for my GF's birthday, and I could not be happier with all the moves she has learned :)
Anna is an amazing beautiful woman inside and out. I've had the pleasure of watching her dance for over 10 years and am so excited to have an instructional DVD by her.

This DVD rocks!  I bought it for my wife after she expressed an interest in learning the art of belly dance and she watched it five times already. I watched it too because Anna is mesmerizing.

Anna has her own style of dancing and teaching.  Definitely check this out!

i have purchased tis dvd on amazon and was surprisingly satisfied very easy to follow, it is very detailed, ( i have tried numerous dvd) this dvd explains all movements in details, also has chapter were you can just workout, at the end of chapter there is short dance choreography that makes it fun to get overall feel what you learnt , so cool ,love it! also style as i noticed is more modern comparing to old school Egyptian ,

I made a good choice with Anna dvd. She is easy to follow. She practice several times with lessons before she moves to a different drill. This is a great dvd for beginners who only will like to learn basic belly dance moves.

My girlfriend and I have had the pleasure of seeing Anna perform in different venues throughout NYC and have always enjoyed her dancing.  Anna is an extremely talented and well known belly dancer!  I looked at her website which also is great at showing her dance styles and decided to purchase the dvd for my girlfriend.  All I can say now is WOW...my girlfriend has been using this video and she has learned great moves!  I was actually surprised at how quick she was able to learn and she told me that Anna explains the techniques in a way that is calming and easy to understand...especially for a beginner.  Guys BUY this DVD for your girlfriend!  You'll both be thankful!

Thank you for your DVD...Great for my belly...it's working...Try it out and see it yourself..shed away that fat off of your belly..
Now it is time to get sexy...and appealing not only in cloth...
Two Thumbs Up..
Bravo Anna

I was fortunate to see Anna perform; she is a great and versatile dancer.  I was extremely happy that she made an instructional belly dance dvd.  The moves are well explained and detailed. I love the choreography and I can't wait to show my friends what I learned.  Not only are you learning techniques, you are getting a good workout.  I will definitely recommend this dvd.

Very good instructional video. Easy to follow.  Provides an excellent foundation for authentic belly dance technique. Once you have learned the basic belly dance moves outlined in this video, you will be able to turn on the music and dance!

Honestly this is one of the best new dvd out there! so detailed easy to follow , i would say this is good for beginners , like the idea that every chapter has dance choreography, and i noticed style is a bit modern comparing to traditional belly dance which in my preference is more fun , and also i found that this dvd has lots of new moves to learn,loved it!!! thank you

Was looking for a belly dance tutorial dvd for my mom who loves belly dancing, but lazy to leave her apartment. And Anna's dvd was a great purchase, cause you get all necessary moves in one dvd, everything is explained very nicely. The music and background create a middle eastern atmosphere. Mom is happy and ready to shake!
Would definitelly recommend!

One of the best tutorials I have - well explained, nicely done. Anna is more professional than many on the belly dance scene. This dvd taught me all of her tricks. Totally recommended! I have never been on the level I am now.

I love this dvd!!! A great way to begin belly dancing without feeling overwhelmed or bored. I also checked out her website and she is super talented in various forms of dance. She has an amazing profile and background and everyone should view the website. I am looking forward for more videos. I cant wait to show my boyfriend all I have learned. :)

This is an excellent way to start your belly dance practice. Anna is one of the most talented dancers in North America. She is extremely knowledgeable and knows how to explain the technique basics to the people who are just starting out their practice. Highly recommend this course for those who are looking to embark on the wonderful belly dance adventure.
